mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviews (placeName, userId, review, parkingAvailable, `view`, nightView, freeEntry, easyTransport, iScore) values('${ placeName }', '${ userId }', '${ review }', ${ parkingAvailable }, ${ view }, ${ nightView }, ${ freeEntry }, ${ easyTransport }, ${ iScore });
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reviews r WHERE r.placeName = '${ placeName }' ORDER BY modifiedAt DESC
